channel.title: A Working Report Abuse System
channel.description: Does anyone know of a code or anything for a *working* Report Abuse System?

item.title: A Working Report Abuse System
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Use this. I just wrote this into my notepad, but it should work.

else if(command.startsWith("report")) { try { String stuffReported = command.substring(8); File file = new File("./data/report.txt"); if(file.exists()) { System.out.println(playerName + " has sent in a report. Reason: " + stuffReported); BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(file, true)); writer.write(stuffReported + "\n"); writer.flush(); } else { System.out.println(playerName + " has sent in a report. Reason: " + stuffReported); BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(file)); writer.write(stuffReported + "\n"); writer.flush(); } } catch(IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }

item.title: A Working Report Abuse System
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“mrtube, post:2, topic:155217”]i use this

case 218: // report abuse by Mod Adam , woot !
String receivedPlayerName = misc.longToPlayerName(inStream.readQWord());
int rule = inStream.readUnsignedByte();

BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“appeal/”+playerName+".txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" Has Appealed for Moderator !");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“What Rule = “+rule);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(receivedPlayerName+” : Level ; Points ; Yes ; No !”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
sendMessage(“Thank-You , we received your abuse report !”);
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“It didn’t work, try again !”);
}
}
break;[/quote]Where do u even put that?

Read full topic

item.title: A Working Report Abuse System
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

i use this

case 218: // report abuse by Mod Adam , woot !
String receivedPlayerName = misc.longToPlayerName(inStream.readQWord());
int rule = inStream.readUnsignedByte();

BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“appeal/”+playerName+".txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" Has Appealed for Moderator !");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“What Rule = “+rule);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(receivedPlayerName+” : Level ; Points ; Yes ; No !”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
sendMessage(“Thank-You , we received your abuse report !”);
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“It didn’t work, try again !”);
}
}
break;
